name: Bug report
about: The game crashes or something doesn't work
title: "[BUG] "
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behaviour:
1. Go to (...)
2. Do (...)
3. (...) is not working

**Expected behaviour**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots or a upload a video to help explain the problem.

**Logs**
Please navigate to `%appdata%\r2modmanPlus-local\HadesII\profiles\Default\ReturnOfModding` (replace `Default` with your profile name) and attach the `LogOutput.log` file to this issue.

**Save File**
If you can reproduce the bug on your save file, please create a `.zip` of all files starting with `Profile<Your Save Slot>` located in `C:\Users\<username>\Saved Games\Hades II`
